definition: ghost of a person who died by hanging/hanged person/(coll.) inchworm/hangman (word game)
to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: His hanging face, like a devil's sick of sin;
sentences.chinese: 他的一張吊死鬼的臉，就像惡魔一樣可怖。

definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
Two deities, one short, one tall, chained together at the ankle, responsible for rewarding the good and punishing the bad
ghost of sb devoured by a tiger who helps the tiger devour others
mourning staff draped in white, held at a funeral to show filial piety
to play tricks/to cheat/to get up to mischief/to become a ghost/to give up the ghost
same as 閻羅王|阎罗王/Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
